newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Nordstrom FY98 estimate cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Nordstrom FY98 estimate cut.

text.p: -- Rodman & Renshaw Inc Friday lowered its estimate for Nordstrom Inc's earnings in fiscal 1998 to $2.10 from $2.40.
-- The move follows what Rodman called disappointing results for Nordstrom in the fourth quarter of 1996 and an outlook for major challenges on the horizon, Rodman said.

-- Rodman said the retailer reported earnings of $0.53 in the fourth quarter, compared to $0.67 a year ago. The latest figure is $0.12 below Rodman's estimate and $0.11 lower than analysts' consensus estimates, Rodman said.
-- Rodman said it was maintaining its neutral rating.
-- Nordstrom shares were down 7/8 Friday at 35-1/8.
